Title: Mindfulness Monday
Description: Join us for a relaxing yoga and mindfulness session to reduce stress and improve well-being.

Title: Resume & Interview Workshop
Description: Career Services leads a hands-on workshop on resume writing and mock interviews for job and internship preparation.

Title: Community Food Drive
Description: Volunteer to sort and distribute donations for our campus food drive. Help the community and log service hours.

Title: Undergrad Research Poster Night
Description: Undergraduate students present research posters and talk about their projects and findings.

Title: International Culture Fest
Description: An evening of cultural performances, food, and exhibits celebrating global traditions and heritage.

Title: Public Speaking Bootcamp
Description: A skills workshop to build confidence in public speaking, presentation design, and persuasive communication.
